China vows judicial disclosure after outcry over plan to curb access to rulingsChina's top court has pledged to "deepen judicial disclosure" after its plan to curtail access to court decisions faced unusual public criticism from lawyers and legal experts. Novatek's Ust-Luga Baltic Sea fuel complex under attackRussian energy company Novatek on Sunday was forced to suspend some operations at Ust-Luga, a huge Baltic Sea fuel export terminal and processing complex, due to a fire started by what Ukrainian media said was a drone attack.
